es.eucm.eadandroid.common.loader.parsers
Class AssessmentHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      es.eucm.eadandroid.common.loader.parsers.AssessmentHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
public class AssessmentHandler
extends DefaultHandler

This class is the handler to parse the assesment rules file of the adventure. This class is only used for specific xml assessment files, that is a past characteristic, to preserve past game version. In new versions, the assessment info is in chapter.xml file. For this reason the parsing of assessment is now in chapter parsing (ChapterHandler)
